[{"id":"dev-17383","entityId":"86-22852","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"dev"},{"name":"summary","value":"[Error] Call to a member function getCode() on string"},{"name":"reporterFullName","value":"Denys Bulakh"},{"name":"created","value":"1581674169051"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"17383"},{"name":"description","value":"
Please fix or add some logs to understand which currency is missing: https://rpm.newrelic.com/accounts/231796/applications/73129344/filterable_errors#/show/cf3080ed-4f0e-11ea-b38c-0242ac11000a_0_3229/stack_trace?top_facet=transactionUiName&primary_facet=error.class&barchart=barchart

Problem here just represents an issue with missing rate for $toCurrency:
public function convert($price, $toCurrency = null)
    {
        if (is_null($toCurrency)) {
            return $price;
        } else {
            $rate = $this->getRate($toCurrency);
            if ($rate) {
                return $price * $rate;
            }
        }

        throw new Exception(Mage::helper('directory')->__('Undefined rate from "%s-%s".', $this->getCode(),
            $toCurrency->getCode()));
    }

Error
/resellers/account/cancelbookingpreview
14 Feb 2020, 10:46
Error message
Error: Uncaught exception 'Error' with message 'Call to a member function getCode() on string' in /var/www/app/app/code/core/Mage/Directory/Model/Currency.php:194

EnvironmentWindows 10, Version 76.0.3809.132 (Official Build) (64-bit)

Steps to reproduce:

  1. login to info@ice-mountain.com and go to Dashboard » Bookings »Booking overview
  2. Search the name: "passemier"
  3. Click on any Reservation with this name

Actual result:

504 gateway time-out

Expected result:

Reservation should open in order to be modified or confirmed

URLhttps://www.regiondo.de/resellers/account/availabilities
Product ID23612
Product ID24639
Account emailinfo@driving-area.de
Supplier ID11542
EnvironmentWindows 10, Chrome Version 60.0.3112.90 (Offizieller Build) (64-Bit)

What steps will reproduce the problem?
A)
https://www.regiondo.de/resellers/account/availabilities>date 02/09> check availability (6/7)>only 5 participants are shown (Atts. 96,97)

B)
https://www.regiondo.de/resellers/account/availabilities>date 22/09 Offer:"VIP - Schräglagen-Training - BMW Block am Ring"> check availability (2/5)>has to be shown as (1/1/5) because one participant has been cancelled (Att. 98,99)

What is the expected result?

availabilities should be shown correctly in calendar

A) 5/7

B)
1/1/5

What happens instead?

wrong availabilities shown

For Case A) originally the capacity was 6, therefore shown as sold out in frontend. because of that, capacity was manually changed to 7.

URLhttps://www.regiondo.com/resellers/account/availabilities
Product ID23432
Account emailinfo@driving-area.de
Supplier ID11542
EnvironmentWindows 7, Firefox 54.0 (32-Bit)

1. Go to https://www.regiondo.com/resellers/account/availabilities
2. search for Date 09.09.2017
3. Overview is showing 7/7
4. Click on view participants
5. You only have 5 confirmed bookings and 2 canceled bookings

What is expected:
To get the right overview (5/2/7)

What happen instead:
The overview is shown 7/7

Further more for one participant is missing infos like (Email, Name, Telephone, bookingnummer)

","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1581672530451,"updated":0,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":false,"replies":[]}],"tag":[]}, {"id":"dev-17227","entityId":"86-22737","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"dev"},{"name":"summary","value":"[gift voucher redemption] decline of booking request for invisible price lists not possible"},{"name":"reporterFullName","value":"Stefan Seitz"},{"name":"created","value":"1580740777805"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"17227"},{"name":"description","value":"
URLhttps://www.regiondo.com/resellers/account/bookingsview/key/
Product ID106594
Account emailiris.gligorea@regiondo.com
Supplier ID23776
Order #1980837026
Novomind Ticket ID79604



#### Steps to reproduce:
1. https://itsoftwaresibiu.regiondo.com/categories > Offer "Optional: Ticketshop title" > buy 1 ticket as gift for variation "2nd price list", option "asdadfafa" > complete purchase
2. Login > manage offers > my offers > product 106594 > Step 3 > set option "asdadfafa" to invisible > save and publish
3. https://itsoftwaresibiu.regiondo.com/voucher > redeem voucher for any date > request date
4. bookings > bookings > check booking for redeemed gift voucher


#### Actual result:

only "apply changes" button appears, clickng this button is followed by no action
no possibility to decline booking




#### Expected result:

Same as in https://track.regiondo.com/issue/dev-16595

When customer redeems gift certificate for an offer with invisible price list, supplier should have the same booking details template like offer with manual confirmation in order to let supplier decide if he accepts or declines the request.

When supplier declines the request, only value voucher should be proposed as refund method.

Refund should be done to the attendee not to the buyer

After refund system should send email template 58 to attendee
"},{"name":"updaterFullName","value":"Maksym Hopei"},{"name":"reporterName","value":"stefan.seitz"},{"name":"commentsCount","value":"1"},{"name":"updaterName","value":"m.hopei"},{"name":"markdown","value":"false"},{"name":"wikified","value":"true"},{"name":"votes","value":"0"},{"name":"updated","value":"1581497764709"},{"name":"links","value":[{"value":"dev-16595","type":"Relates","role":"relates to"}]},{"name":"When is it needed ?","value":["Major"],"valueId":["Major"],"color":{"bg":"#ffee9c","fg":"#b45f06"}},{"name":"Type","value":["Bug"],"valueId":["Bug"],"color":null},{"name":"State","value":["Feedback"],"valueId":["Feedback"],"color":{"bg":"#ff7123","fg":"#fff"}},{"name":"Reproducible","value":["Yes"],"valueId":["Yes"],"color":null},{"name":"Account Segment","value":["All"],"valueId":["All"],"color":null},{"name":"Assignee","value":[{"value":"m.hopei","fullName":"Maksym Hopei"}]},{"name":"Score","value":["32"],"valueId":["32"],"color":null},{"name":"Impact on loss of revenue","value":["6"],"valueId":["6"],"color":null},{"name":"Impact on daily business","value":["8"],"valueId":["8"],"color":null},{"name":"Impact on end customer experience","value":["8"],"valueId":["8"],"color":null},{"name":"Impact on legal or financial","value":["10"],"valueId":["10"],"color":null},{"name":"sprint","value":[{"value":"First sprint","id":"Team Zulu:First sprint"}]},{"name":"attachments","value":[{"value":"image.png","id":"89-66145","url":"https://track.regiondo.com/_persistent/image.png?file=89-66145&c=true"},{"value":"image1.png","id":"89-66146","url":"https://track.regiondo.com/_persistent/image1.png?file=89-66146&c=true"}]}],"comment":[{"id":"88-65661","author":"m.hopei","authorFullName":"Maksym Hopei","issueId":"dev-17227","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"

@Walid Dechri, this all looks like intentional behaviour. You mentioned that this “Apply changes” functionality must not be there, but the only case when it is there is when the redeemed option is not visible or doesn't exist anymore. Please suggest how to proceed.

","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1581497759869,"updated":0,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":true,"replies":[]}],"tag":[]}, {"id":"dev-17192","entityId":"86-22660","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"dev"},{"name":"summary","value":"[POS][API] Social login with facebook and google"},{"name":"reporterFullName","value":"Viktoriia Karenko"},{"name":"created","value":"1579785912463"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"17192"},{"name":"description","value":"

Please add possibility to login with google and facebook with new oAuth2.0.
If reseller for current email doesn't exist please return an error "Unfortunately we cannot find a Regiondo account for this email address".

Input data:

access_token=facebook/google_access_token
scope=reseller-data,
grant_type=social_login,
client_id=POS,
client_secret=client_secret

Output data:

Same as we have for normal login

[{"id":"dev-17227","entityId":"86-22737","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"dev"},{"name":"summary","value":"[gift voucher redemption] decline of booking request for invisible price lists not possible"},{"name":"reporterFullName","value":"Stefan Seitz"},{"name":"created","value":"1580740777805"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"17227"},{"name":"description","value":"
URLhttps://www.regiondo.com/resellers/account/bookingsview/key/
Product ID106594
Account emailiris.gligorea@regiondo.com
Supplier ID23776
Order #1980837026
Novomind Ticket ID79604



#### Steps to reproduce:
1. https://itsoftwaresibiu.regiondo.com/categories > Offer "Optional: Ticketshop title" > buy 1 ticket as gift for variation "2nd price list", option "asdadfafa" > complete purchase
2. Login > manage offers > my offers > product 106594 > Step 3 > set option "asdadfafa" to invisible > save and publish
3. https://itsoftwaresibiu.regiondo.com/voucher > redeem voucher for any date > request date
4. bookings > bookings > check booking for redeemed gift voucher


#### Actual result:

only "apply changes" button appears, clickng this button is followed by no action
no possibility to decline booking




#### Expected result:

Same as in https://track.regiondo.com/issue/dev-16595

When customer redeems gift certificate for an offer with invisible price list, supplier should have the same booking details template like offer with manual confirmation in order to let supplier decide if he accepts or declines the request.

When supplier declines the request, only value voucher should be proposed as refund method.

Refund should be done to the attendee not to the buyer

After refund system should send email template 58 to attendee

@Walid Dechri, this all looks like intentional behaviour. You mentioned that this “Apply changes” functionality must not be there, but the only case when it is there is when the redeemed option is not visible or doesn't exist anymore. Please suggest how to proceed.

","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1581497759869,"updated":0,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":true,"replies":[]}],"tag":[]}, {"id":"dev-17192","entityId":"86-22660","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"dev"},{"name":"summary","value":"[POS][API] Social login with facebook and google"},{"name":"reporterFullName","value":"Viktoriia Karenko"},{"name":"created","value":"1579785912463"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"17192"},{"name":"description","value":"

Please add possibility to login with google and facebook with new oAuth2.0.
If reseller for current email doesn't exist please return an error "Unfortunately we cannot find a Regiondo account for this email address".

Input data:

access_token=facebook/google_access_token
scope=reseller-data,
grant_type=social_login,
client_id=POS,
client_secret=client_secret

Output data:

Same as we have for normal login
